game.name: Far Cry® 6
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Captions available, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support, HDR available
game.shortDescription: 긴장감 넘치는 현대 게릴라전 현장으로 뛰어들어 보세요. 생생한 전투와 방대한 규모의 게임플레이 경험이 가득한 놀라운 풍경과 함께 전투를 즐기기에 이보다 더 좋은 때는 없을 겁니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Enter the adrenaline-filled world of a modern-day guerrilla revolution. With stunning vistas, visceral gunplay, and a huge variety of gameplay experiences, there's never been a better time to join the fight.
game.developers: Ubisoft Toronto, Ubisoft Montreal, Ubisoft Kyiv, Ubisoft Shanghai, Ubisoft Berlin

reviewHighlights.text: This game feels off. No skills upgrade and previous Far Cry would roast it so hard. Spent my minimum wage and got yeeted instead :((((
Not as fun as Far Cry cult in the US woods game but still amazingly huge and lush.
